result.execSummary:
The defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

records.addlTxt: Defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards in court in custody with attorney Lane Fitzgerald.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Amended Information filed, copy to Defendant, reading waived.  Counts 1 and 2 dismissed and read in.  No contest plea to count 3, Court finds defendant guilty.  Court orders 90 days Rock Co Jail; 9 days Rock Co Jail in lieu of $443 costs, consecutive to jail sentence; 99 days sentence credit = TIME SERVED.

Defendant Jerard Anthony Edwards in court in custody with attorney Lane Fitzgerald.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  No contest plea to count 1, Court finds defendant guilty.  Guilty plea to count 2, Court finds defendant guilty.  State not victim compliant, continue for sentencing.  Defendant to remain at Rock Co Jail.  Sentencing hearing scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.

Attorney Lane Fitzgerald in court.  Katharine Buker appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Writ not prepared.  State to prepare Writ.  Status conference scheduled for November 5, 2015 at 11:00 am.  Status conference scheduled for November 16, 2015 at 08:30 am.
